get.description:
Get summary insights for mini cards on dashboard pages.
Returns 2-3 quick, actionable insights with caching (1-hour TTL).

parameters.name: page_context

schema.description: Page context: dashboard, campaigns, or creatives
schema.title: Page Context

parameters.description: Page context: dashboard, campaigns, or creatives

get.description:
Get comprehensive deep analysis for dedicated insights page.
Returns detailed executive summary, findings, trends, and recommendations.

Get comparison report between two time periods.

Supports breakdown types:
- none: Overall overview
- campaign_name: By campaign name
- ad_set_name: By ad set name
- ad_name: By ad name
- date: By date
- week: By week
- month: By month

Filters can be applied to narrow results by campaign, ad set, or ad name.

parameters.name: dimension

schema.description: Dimension level: overview, campaign, or ad
schema.title: Dimension

parameters.description: Dimension level: overview, campaign, or ad

parameters.name: breakdown

schema.description: Breakdown type: none, campaign_name, ad_set_name, ad_name, date, week, month
schema.title: Breakdown

parameters.description: Breakdown type: none, campaign_name, ad_set_name, ad_name, date, week, month

parameters.name: ad_set_filter

schema.description: Filter by ad set name (partial match)
schema.title: Ad Set Filter

parameters.description: Filter by ad set name (partial match)
